_comments.description: Template for country policy commitments JSON

fields_explanation.target_year: Year to achieve target emissions (int, e.g., 2050)
fields_explanation.target_reduction_pct: Percentage reduction from baseline to achieve (0-100)
fields_explanation.baseline_year: Reference year for baseline emissions (int, e.g., 2020)

policy_action_fields.sector: Sector name (string, e.g., Energy, Transport, Industry)
policy_action_fields.baseline_year: Reference year for this sector (usually same as country baseline_year)
policy_action_fields.baseline_emissions_mtco2: Sector baseline emissions in MtCO₂ (float, can be negative for carbon sinks)
policy_action_fields.share_pct: Percentage share of total emissions from this sector (0-100)
policy_action_fields.reduction_target_pct: Target % reduction for this sector from its baseline (0-100+)
policy_action_fields.implementation_years: Array of years with progress data [2024, 2025, ...]
policy_action_fields.yearly_improvement_pct: Cumulative % reduction achieved each year (must increase monotonically)

validation_rules.share_pct_sum: Sum of all share_pct should equal 100% (approximately)
validation_rules.arrays_same_length: implementation_years and yearly_improvement_pct must have same length
validation_rules.status_values: status must be one of: 'On track', 'Behind schedule', 'Ahead'

calculation_notes.weighted_reduction: Uses share_pct to weight each sector's contribution to total reduction
